  1. used in orders for emphasis: let’s, just

intj
  1. used to express surprise or wonder: ah, oh, ha, why
  2. used to express pleasure, relief: ah
  3. used when you are not certain about something and you would like confirmation: eh, well, right, or translated with a tag question
  4. (colloquial) used to indicate that one did not hear what was said: eh, huh
  5. used to express understanding, recognition, or realization: oh
  6. used to express displeasure, objection
  7. used to express criticism or disapproval: now

conj
  1. used to describe how two facts are different: whereas, while
  2. used to introduce an idea that is different or opposite to the idea that is desired, expected or that you have stated previously: but, yet, rather
  3. used to start a new sentence or clause that continues or adds to a previous sentence or clause: and

conj
  1. used to indicate immediate succession of events, no sooner... than..., the moment, directly

column2:
verb
  1. (intransitive) to rumble, to popple
  2. (reflexive, usually in 3p.) (+ се (se)) to produce or conduct rumbling noise

verb
  1. (intransitive) to taste tarry, poignant (for spoilt food)

verb
  1. (intransitive) to sprinkle, to drizzle, to strew
  2. (reflexive) (~ се) to burst, to spew (for liquid, mucus)

verb
  1. (intransitive, with в) to reach for, to reach into
  2. to reach for, to reach into
  3. to pay up (pay unwillingly)
  4. (dialect) to enter quickly; to pop into

noun
  1. (countable) beetle, bug (holometabolous insect of order Coleoptera)
  2. (colloquial) bumblebee, humblebee (large bee of genus Bombus)
  3. (colloquial, figuratively) audio spy device (gadget for recording conversations)

noun
  1. coast, shore, seashore
  2. waterside, river bank, bank, riverside, side
  3. strand
  4. levee

noun
  1. (dialectal) bulge, knar, snag, knob (of surface or plant)
  2. (by extension, Rupian dialects) young branch, bough (of tree)

noun
  1. dupe, fall guy, juggins
  2. fool, simpleton, ass, booby, dolt, chump, ninny, puppethead, fathead, nincompoop, gander
  3. easy game, easy mark, easy meat

verb
  1. (intransitive) to be awake (not to be asleep)

verb
  1. (intransitive, dialectal) Alternative form of бъда (bǎda, “to be”)

verb
  1. (transitive) to wake (up), to awaken (to make somebody stop sleeping)
  2. (transitive) to arouse, to excite, evoke (to stimulate feelings)
  3. (reflexive) (~ се) to wake up, to awaken (see будя се (budja se))

verb

noun
  1. (colloquial) male blab, male blabber, male windbag, male chatterbox, male chatterer, male tattler, male tattletale, male twaddler, male gasbag

noun

  2. (dialectal) hill with gentle slopes
  3. (military) elevation, height

character
  1. The third letter of the Bulgarian alphabet, called въ and written in the Cyrillic script.

prep
  1. going inside (of) or within the limits of, into, in, at, to
  2. against, especially with force or violence, into
  3. used to indicate where something is or where something happens, in, at, on
  4. used with certain time expressions to say when something happens, at, in, on, during
  5. used to indicate a change in state, to, into
  6. used to indicate a state or condition, in, on
  7. used to show how or in what way something is done, in, at
  8. used to indicate the parts forming something, in
  9. used to describe the clothes or the colour of something, in
  10. used to indicate a sphere where a certain quality is present, at

verb
  1. (transitive, dialectal) to lure an animal with a call

noun
  1. (dialectal) pit, trench, depression
  2. (dialectal, agriculture) rural land

verb
  1. to take out, to remove
  2. to extract (e.g. a tooth)
  3. (colloquial) to earn
  4. (colloquial) to get, to obtain (a document)
  5. (colloquial) to produce (a product), to grow (a plant)
  6. (colloquial) to get rid of, to eliminate (a stain)
  7. (colloquial) to subtract (a number)
  8. to reach (a conclusion)
  9. (slang) to show off (clothing or a part of the body)

adj
  1. important (having relevant and crucial value), of importance, momentous, crucial, key, grave, weighty, substantial, material

noun
  1. rainfall, snowfall
  2. (technical) quantity of precipitation (over some period)

noun
  1. (dialectal) hollow, concave structure
  2. (by extension) mountainous valley

verb
  1. to fall (of rain, snow or hail)

  4. (colloquial, figuratively) to rain down, to fall in large quantities
  5. (impersonal) it rains, it snows, it hails

  7. (dialectal) to build (a fire)
  8. (dialectal, intransitive) to apply oneself [+ за (object) = to something] or [+ на (object) = to something]

pron
  1. (dated) full form of the second-person plural pronoun in the dative case, used as the indirect object of a verb; to you, for you, you

noun

verb
  1. to boil, to brew

particle
  1. A question-forming interrogative particle for yes-no questions, it is put after the part of the sentence the question is about; not translated.
  2. A question-forming interrogative particle used in multiple-choice questions, it is put after each option the person being asked can choose from; not translated.
  3. Used after other interrogatives for emphasis.
  4. used instead of a conjunction in indirect questions, if, whether
  5. Used instead of a conjunction in subordinate conditional clauses, if.
  6. Used instead of a conjunction in subordinate temporal clauses, when, as soon as, once, whenever, every time.

verb
  1. to throw
  2. to throw (someone) down to the ground
  3. to spread, to stretch out (a blanket, laundry on a line, etc.)

  8. to look like, to resemble, to take after (a relative)

character
  1. The fourteenth letter of the Bulgarian alphabet, written in the Cyrillic script.

prep
  1. used to express possession, of, 's
  2. used to indicate the indirect object, to (or it's not translated)
  3. used with nouns formed from intransitive verbs to indicate the subject of the action, of
  4. used with nouns formed from transitive verbs to indicate the direct object of the action, of
  5. used with some verbs such as уча, мириша, etc. to give a description of the action
  6. positioned at the upper surface of, within the limits of, on, on, at, in
  7. used to show direction, to, on
  8. used to indicate destination, in the direction of, and arriving at, on, to, for
  9. used to introduce a noun phrase that describes the verb, or if it is a linking verb, to describe the subject of the verb
  10. used to show a reason or cause, for
  11. used with certain time expressions to show when something happens, on, at, in (or it is not translated)
  12. used to introduce a verbal noun and to indicate that the action described by the verbal noun happens at the same time as another action, while, when
  13. used with от to indicate the period over which something happens, to
  14. used to show the circumstances under which something happens, with, in
  15. used to show age, at
  16. used to indicate the distance away from something, at (or it is not translated)
  17. used to indicate the quantity used for buying, selling or measuring something, by
  18. used to separate dimensions when describing the size of something, by
  19. used to indicate the rate at which something happens, per, by, a
  20. used to indicate the parts into which something is divided, in, into, by
  21. used to show how or in what way something is done, by, in
  22. used to indicate a change in state, to, into
  23. used to indicate an instrument
  24. used to indicate a game
  25. near, close to
  26. used to indicate a language, a way of speaking, etc., in

particle

verb
  1. to transport, to carry by vehicle
  2. to take or lead (people or animals through or past somewhere)
  3. to pass, to push (something through something)
  4. to run (something, e.g. one's hand) [+ по (object) = over a surface]
  5. to install, to lay (a road, railway, telephone, plumbing, etc.; particularly something that connects two places)
  6. to draw (a line connecting two points)
  7. (figuratively) to pass, to spend (time)
  8. (figuratively) to spend time (in some manner)
  9. (figuratively) to experience, to undergo, to endure (an illness, trouble, an ordeal, etc.)
  10. (figuratively, slang) to mislead, to deceive (someone into doing something detrimental to them)
  11. (slang, vulgar) to lie one's way into (someone)'s pants, to seduce (someone) through dishonest means
  12. (reflexive) (~ се) to pass (of time)
  13. (reflexive) (~ се) to last [+ за (object) = for a specified time; of something painful or unpleasant]
  14. (reflexive) (~ се) to get deceived (into doing something detrimental to oneself)

column2:
verb
  1. to finish, to complete (an action)
  2. to use up, to exhaust
  3. (transitive and intransitive) to graduate
  4. (intransitive) to end, to finish, to be over
  5. (intransitive) to end up
  6. (colloquial) to die
  7. (reflexive, colloquial) (~ се) to run out (to have nothing more left)

pron
  1. (reflexive, clitic) the accusative short form of the reflexive pronoun себе си (sebe si), part of reflexive verbs, denoting that the subject is simultaneously the direct object; corresponds to myself, yourself, himself, herself, itself, ourselves, yourselves, themselves
  2. (reciprocal, clitic) accusative reciprocal pronoun, denoting that the agents perform the mutual actions among themselves; corresponds to each other, one another
  3. (reflexive, clitic) reflexive pronoun, part of autocausative verbs, denoting that the referent represented by the subject combines the activity of actor and undergoes a change of state like a patient
  4. (reflexive, clitic) reflexive pronoun, part of anticausative verbs, denoting that the subject of the verb undergoes an action or change of state whose agent is unclear or nonexistent
  5. (reflexive, clitic) used for passive constructions with transitive verbs and undetermined agent
  6. (reflexive, clitic) used for passive constructions with transitive verbs and determined agent
  7. (reflexive, clitic) inherent part of an unergative reflexive or reciprocal verb with no meaning of its own, and an obligatory part of the verb's lexical entry

pron
  1. (reflexive) myself, yourself, himself, herself, itself, ourselves, yourselves, themselves (no nominative case)
  2. (reflexive) oneself

pron
  1. Short form of the third-person singular feminine pronoun in the dative case, used as the indirect object of a verb, translated as to her, for her, her, when the noun is animate, and as to it, for it, it, when the noun is inanimate.
  2. Short form of the third-person singular feminine possessive pronoun, translated as her when the noun is animate, and as its when the noun is inanimate.

character
  1. Used to indicate a stressed syllable, placed overtop a vowel as part of such a syllable.
  2. Used to disambiguate the pronoun ѝ (ì) from the conjunction и (i, “and”).

character
